Name: Hero Puzzle
About the game: Join the Hero Puzzle to help the hero save the princess. It is made for yourself, those who love brain hacking games and those who love adventure. . What do you think your IQ is? It is the brain hacking puzzles in Hero Puzzle that will give you the answer. Train your intelligence with these puzzle games that will help develop your brain. Especially since this is a rescue game, you will find it fascinating and engaging from start to finish. If you can't solve the pin puzzle, you won't be able to save the princess and get the treasure Various missions await you in our brain hacking game. Kill enemies, pass lava, search for treasure or become a hero save the princess. Show your wits by solving many of challenging brain puzzles. FEATURE: ★ Challenge your brain. Try to solve puzzles in as many ways as you can as these are logical physics puzzles. ★ Graphics, sound, effects will make you unable to stop playing ★ Many of puzzles updated regularly
